response.overview: Prostitute Anita is always ready. That's why she likes to jerk off to Rambo during her breaks. She is willing to make an "exception" for her customers and not quite stick to the rules. Her madam doesn't like that at all and so she picks a client for Anita who makes it very clear to her how the hare runs. Silvia and Paul also get it on all the time. Partly because they want to give their neighbor Martin, the peeping Tom, a proper fuck show. But one day Silvia catches Martin and so he can finally show what he's got. Nadja's cunt is also itching and so her daily routine is characterized by the search for sexual satisfaction. With her friend Uschi, she seduces the employee of a boutique in order to get a well-deserved afternoon fuck.
response.title: Kabinettstückchen
